message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.DS

The paper proposes a deep continual learning algorithm that addresses data stream problems in dynamic environments. The algorithm uses deep neural networks and features a flexible structure that can be constructed from scratch. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a mechanism for growing and pruning hidden nodes, which is related to Neural Networks (cs.NE) and Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with data stream problems, which is related to the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.AI, followed by cs.NE, cs.CV, and cs.DS.
